title: Trendy Urban Loft with Rooftop Deck in Vibrant Żoliborz
description: Experience city living at its finest in this stylish 58 sqm loft, carefully renovated to blend modern comfort with warehouse-chic aesthetics. Soaring ceilings, an open-plan living area, and upgraded soundproof walls create a private haven perfect for quiet relaxation or work-from-home days. Enjoy abundant sunlight throughout and plenty of space for entertaining, with a spacious bedroom, two sleek contemporary bathrooms, and a panoramic rooftop deck ideal for evening wind-downs.
neighborhood_description: Żoliborz is known for its balanced yet trendy vibe, attracting young professionals and couples craving an active urban lifestyle without compromising on green spaces. Mornings can start with coffee on the waterfront or a jog through leafy boulevards, while evenings offer a selection of local cafés, artisan bakeries, and lively bars— all within walking or biking distance.
lifestyle_benefits: great for remote work or creative hobbies
easy commute with multiple transport options
trendy area with coffee shops and nightlife
target_buyer: A trendy young couple or professional seeking a modern, stylish living environment close to both work and leisure. Someone who values quiet yet cosmopolitan living with amenities supporting an active and healthy urban lifestyle.
market_positioning: A premium niche property for buyers seeking above-market-level design and amenities in a sought-after urban neighborhood. The loft stands out in Żoliborz thanks to its high-spec finishes, premium features, and exclusive rooftop access.
